Title: Saremo giovani e bellissimi
Writer: Marco Borromei, Letizia Lamartire, Anna Zagaglia
Actors: Barbora Bobulova, Alessandro Piavani, Massimiliano Gallo, Federica Sabatini
Plot: In the 90s, Isabella was eighteen and a star. 20 years later, she is still singing those same songs in small town bars with her son Bruno, playing guitar. It's because of him that her career stopped. At least it's what she tells herself.
